paper_abstract: Ramsey numbers deal with conditions when a combinatorial object necessarily contains some smaller given objects. It is well known that it is very difficult to obtain the values of Ramsey numbers. In this work, a theoretical chemical/biological solution is presented in terms of membrane computing for the decision version of Ramsey number problem, that is, to decide whether an integer n is the value of Ramsey number R(k, l), where k and l are integers.
paper_title: COMPUTATION OF RAMSEY NUMBERS BY P SYSTEMS WITH ACTIVE MEMBRANES
